title: iOS Developer
description: We’re seeking an experienced and passionate iOS developer to join our mobile team in building the next generation of intuitive and beautiful applications for iPhone and iPad. In this role, you will have the opportunity to help shape and execute our technical strategy while working with a group of talented developers. You’ll work alongside our product and design teams to implement highly interactive and branded interfaces.
responsibilities:
• Design and develop iOS applications using Agile methodologies
  • Work closely with design and web teams to create compelling and inspiring applications
lookingFor:
• 1+ years of professional iOS programming experience
  • Advanced knowledge of Objective-C, Cocoa, and the iOS SDK
  • Experience with semantic HTML5, CSS, and Javascript in a mobile environment
  • Understanding of Test-driven Development (TDD)/Behavior-driven Development (BDD)
  • Experience with Native Android development preferred
